title: Spacious 2 bedroom home with detached garage - $700 off 1st full month
posting_body: Welcome to The Well, a brand new apartment community in Henderson, Nevada, tailored to fit your ideal lifestyle.
LIVE WELL with thoughtful details such as quartz counters and large windows to let in the warm Nevada sunlight.
Enjoy the convenience of smart home features, such as activity notifications and lighting automation.
WELL by the pool, at the fitness center or in the lounge.
BE WELL in the heart of Union Village, the world's first integrated health village.
Anchored by Henderson Hospital, plans for Union Village include premium outdoor shopping, dining and entertainment venues, hotels, fitness clubs and more.
Call to schedule a tour today!
Use this link for more info:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1055 Sq.
- Spacious Studio, One-, Two- & Three-Bedroom Floor Plans
- Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting
- Choice of Two Stylish Interior Packages
**Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time.
- Coffee Bar with TopBrewer App-Powered Espresso Machine
- Entertainment Kitchen with a Community Dining Space
- Question Mark-Shaped Pool with Spa Deck
- Chic Clubhouse with a Fireplace & Big-Screen TVs
